newsitem.title: USA: Blimpie hires M & A consultant.
newsitem.headline: Blimpie hires M & A consultant.

text.p: Blimpie International Inc said Tuesday it has hired a financial consultant for merger and acquisition activities, corporate restructuring, and joint ventures.
Blimpie said it has retained BC Capital Corp, a privately held company.
The company said BC Capital Corp will provide advisory services, including due diligence work, in connection with its search for potential acquisition candidates.
The company said that through BC Capital Corp, it will monitor entities which are capable of being converted into franchise systems and which will provide possible matches with its core business.
A BC Capital spokesman said its agreement with Blimpie allows that it will paid based on the actual mergers and acquisitions that occur.
